A 25-year veteran of Fitch Ratings  Mr. Duignan has held a variety of senior roles  most recently serving as Global Head of Structured Finance and Covered Bonds.

column4: Breakingviews-WPP underestimates pinch from corporate austerity
column5: LONDON (Reuters Breakingviews) - WPP has underestimated the pinch from corporate austerity. The world’s largest ad group cut its forecast for its preferred measure of sales  blaming lower spending by consumer-goods giants it counts as clients. Boss Martin Sorrell reckons this will reverse. Alternatively  marketing frugality might become the new normal.

column4: Toll's average price to fall as millennials buy cheaper homes
column5: Toll Brothers Inc's  falling average selling price (ASP) signals a new normal for luxury homebuilders in the United States as they sell more  but lower-priced homes  to thrifty millennials.

column4: Canada to consider indirect emissions for TransCanada Energy East pipe
column5: CALGARY  Alberta The review of TransCanada Corp's  proposed Energy East pipeline will consider its indirect greenhouse gas contributions  Canada's National Energy Board (NEB) regulator said on Wednesday  expanding the scope of the assessment.

column4: Canada to consider indirect emissions for TransCanada Energy East pipe
column5: CALGARY  Alberta  Aug 23 The upcoming review of TransCanada Corp's proposed Energy East pipeline will consider its potential indirect contributions to greenhouse gas emissions  Canada's National Energy Board (NEB) regulator said on Wednesday.
